original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.34. Āsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika🔽Āsavavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya          āsava vippayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  āsava sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na āsava sampayuttaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
